explanation: [0-0] On a grassy field, a blond man with black sunglasses is sitting on a black motorcycle, wearing a black T-shirt and jeans. A red car is visible in the background.
[0-2] Next, the blond man is starting the motorcycle.

[2-10] Subsequently, the blond man rides the motorcycle forward, passing another motorcycle traveling to his left. The man on the left motorcycle is wearing black clothes and a black helmet. As the camera zooms out, the blond man continues to drive into the distance, then performs a motorcycle stunt, lifting the front wheel off the ground. He then continues riding away. In the background, you can see a crowd watching the race, many motorcycles and cars, and some tents and buildings.
